name: The Cronicles of Slanddar, Gem Quest
name_original: The Cronicles of Slanddar, Gem Quest
description:
Gem Quest is a RPG, It was made for the 2014 Indie Game Maker Contest

Version 1.1, Windows Version

Version 1.2: Revamped story, new character sprites, enemy sprites, revamp the map, better overall feel of the game- Current Mac Version (Windows June 2018)

Version 1.3 new title screen, new game icon, any bug fixes this will be the final main release, I am planning a free side quest update once the final game is released. Planned Release Aug/Sep 2018

I would like to thank everyone who is going to support this project

Sorry I have not updated the game in awhile been sick and very busy, I am starting work on it again.

March 6/18

I am hoping to get a new version out in the next couple of months that you can play on IOS and Android also
